extendedInfo.description: dondeEsta Family. You can locate your kids in real time + Receive notifications when they leave or arrive to school or home.dondeEsta Family let you protect and locate your kids with the following incredible FEATURES:- Track your kids at any time and in real time by just a simple tap on the screen!-âAt homeâ and âat schoolâ real time indicator: with just a quick glance on the phone screen you will know whether your kids are at home or at school.- Receive notifications when you kid arrives or leaves school/home.- Skipping classes? Receive immediate alerts whenever your kids are not at school during school hours.-Receive alerts if your kids didnât get home when you agreed to.-Receive alerts if your kids need help or if they are in danger.-Get notifications when your kids need a ride back home.-Track your phone when you lose it.dondeEsta Family brings peace of mind to families all over the world and helps them to connect with their family members. dondeEsta Family is a powerful and accurate kid tracker available that let you protect your kids and have peace of mind.USERS' FEEDBACK:âdondeEsta Family is an amazing and incredible app for family safety. I have two teens with the app installed and it really brings me peace of mind. I 100% recommended it to all families with kids and teenagers. Thank you for it!â â Cherrie, Saint Paul, MNâWhen my kid told me >Mom, I would like to go by myself to school< I was not sure about letting her go, I was afraid that something could happen to her. But then a friend told me about dondeEsta Family â Kid Tracker and after trying it I can say it is the best app I have ever downloaded. I let my kid to go by herself to school and I know when she gets to school and when she leaves there. The app is also good for kids, because she only needs to tap on the screen once if she is in danger and I get an alert with a âhelp messageâ and her location.ââ Drake Family, San Francisco, CAâYou really feel safe when you have this app on your phone and on your kids phone. I can locate my kidâs phone at any time. Sometimes they are playing or hanging out with friends and they donât hear my call. Now I donât need to worry about it, because I can track my kidâs phone at any time and know where they are. It is a really good app for family safetyâ - Kristine, Denver, COâWe have three teenagers and this app let us set up some rules. We were tired about our kids going out and arriving back home late. Setting up a Curfew has never been easier. We can teach them how to be more responsible while gaining some peace of mind.â â Marie and Julius Tuff, Loudoun County, VAFREE FEATURE LIST:- Track your kids at any time and in real time by just a simple tap on the screen!- See your family membersâ location on a private map. - Save your kidâs school/college address and your home address.- âAt homeâ and âat schoolâ real time indicator: with just a quick glance on the phone screen you will know whether your kids are at home or at school.- dondeEsta Family gives your kids tools to easily reach you when they need it the most: Panic feature which send you a instantly notification with the location of your kid in danger.- Your kids have tools for easily send you a free notification when they are OK or if they need a ride back home.-Track your phone when you lose it.PREMIUM: - Receive different kind of notifications in your phone such as alerts if your kids are not at school during school hours! Set up curfews! - Receive notifications when they arrive or leave home/school.- Set up your kidsâ school schedule.dondeEsta Family - Kid Tracker is an incredible app for family safety. dondeEsta Family â Kid Tracker brings peace of mind because let you track your kids phone and connect with them at any time. reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s2/Canada
reviews.comment: it is not giving me the correct location. Location stays the same even if my son is already gone . to think that i want to get the premium.. Jeezz i dont think so.
reviews.author: Jennifer Ramos

reviews.title: vincular dondeesta con dondeEsta Family
reviews.comment: Tengo un nokia N8 (symbiam)  donde instale la aplicacion dondeEsta y tengo un sony ericsson Jt281 con android en el cual instal\303\251 dondeEsta Family y he tratado de asociarlos sin exito. He incluso enviado sms entre los telefonos con las tres ??? y no recibo respuesta y ambos estan autorizados por ambos tel\303\251fonos.  Necesito apoyo urgente pues he extraviado el Sony.
reviews.author: Sandra Reyes

reviews.title: Not impressed
reviews.comment: Showed me located but did not flag me on the map, useless
reviews.author: Dean Thomson

reviews.comment: Pregunta c\303\263mo puedo ponerle foto a mi perfil? Porque no se permite agregar mas miembro a la familia solo un hijo y una hija?? Si agregan estas funciones le doy las 5 estrellas.
reviews.author: Ruperto Camarena
